page.title: 20Pontrhydyfen-Residents'Views
page.content:
Ponrhydyfen is{liked}because it is a {quiet village with helpful and {friendly people full of a community {spirit and nestling in picturesque {surroundings within easy reach of {surrounding towns. }Many of the senior citizens also stated that they were born in the village and would not dream of leaving the village atmosphere. An interesting point was that 8 households found the bus services convenient whilst another 5 found them infrequent.
Children also felt that there should be more places for them to go and more things to do. They wanted more equipment in the parks, more shops and a cafe. The majority felt that it was still a very nice place to live.
